text: Polypedates impresus is a species of frogs in the family Rhacophoridae. It is endemic to Yunnan, China, where it has been recorded in Pu'er. It is known from Yunnan (Puer, Lüchun, and Xishuangbanna) and Guangxi (Jingxi County).http://research.amnh.org/vz/herpetology/amphibia/Amphibia/Anura/Rhacophoridae/Rhacophorinae/Polypedates/Polypedates- impresus ==References== * Yang, 2008 : Amphibia. in Yang & Rao, 2008 : Amphibia and Reptilia of Yunnan, *http://research.amnh.org/vz/herpetology/amphibia/Amphibia/Anura/Rhacophoridae/Rhacophorinae/Polypedates/Polypedates- impresus impresus Category:Amphibians of China Category:Frogs of Asia Category:Amphibians described in 2008
title: Polypedates impresus
